FlexGrid

A grid library based on the flex display property.

Responsive

Responsive modifiers enable specifying different column sizes, offsets, alignment and distribution at xs, sm, md & lg viewport widths.

<div class="grid">
	<div class="col-12 col-sm-3 col-md-2 col-lg-1">
		<div class="box _row"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-6 col-sm-6 col-md-8 col-lg-10">
		<div class="box _row"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-6 col-sm-3 col-md-2 col-lg-1">
		<div class="box _row"></div>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="grid">
	<div class="col-12 col-sm-3 col-md-2 col-lg-1">
		<div class="box _row"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-12 col-sm-9 col-md-10 col-lg-11">
		<div class="box _row"></div>
	</div>
</div>
<div class="grid">
	<div class="col-10 col-sm-6 col-md-8 col-lg-10">
		<div class="box _row"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2 col-sm-6 col-md-4 col-lg-2">
		<div class="box _row"></div>
	</div>
</div>

Fluid

Percent based widths allow fluid resizing of columns and rows.

.col-6 {
  flex-basis: 50%;
}

Simple Syntax

All you need to remember is .grid > .column, content.

<div class="grid">
	<div class="col-12">
		<div class="box">12</div>
	</div>
</div>

Auto Width

Add any number of auto sizing columns to a row. Let the grid figure it out.

<div class="grid">
	<div class="col">
		<div class="box">auto</div>
	</div>
</div>

Nested Grids

Nest grids inside grids inside grids.

7/9/4
7/9/2
7/3
5/12/6
5/12/6
<div class="grid">
	<div class="col-7">
		<div class="grid">
			<div class="col-9">
				<div class="grid">
					<div class="col-4">
						<div class="box">7/9/4</div>
					</div>
					<div class="col-8">
						<div class="box">7/9/2</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
			<div class="col-3">
				<div class="grid">
					<div class="col">
						<div class="box">7/3</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-5">
		<div class="grid">
			<div class="col-12">
				<div class="grid">
					<div class="col-12 col-lg-6">
						<div class="box">5/12/6</div>
					</div>
					<div class="col-12 col-lg-6">
						<div class="box">5/12/6</div>
					</div>
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

Alignment

Add classes to align elements to the start or end of a row as well as the top, bottom, or center of a column

._start

<div class="grid _start">
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

._center

<div class="grid _center">
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

._end

<div class="grid _end">
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

Here is an example of using the modifiers in conjunction to acheive different alignment at different viewport sizes.

Example
<div class="grid _center _end-sm _start-lg">
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

._top

<div class="grid _top">
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box _large"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

._middle

<div class="grid _middle">
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box _large"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

._bottom

<div class="grid _bottom">
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box _large"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-6">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

Distribution

Add classes to distribute the contents of a row or column.

._around

<div class="grid _around">
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

._between

<div class="grid _between">
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box"></div>
	</div>
</div>

Reordering

Add classes to reorder columns.

.grid > .col-first

1
2
3
4
5
6
<div class="grid">
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">1</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">2</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">3</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">4</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">5</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2 col-first">
		<div class="box _selected">6</div>
	</div>
</div>

.grid > .col-last

1
2
3
4
5
6
<div class="grid">
	<div class="col-2 col-last">
		<div class="box _selected">1</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">2</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">3</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">4</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">5</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">6</div>
	</div>
</div>

Reversing

._reverse

1
2
3
4
5
6
<div class="grid _reverse">
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">1</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">2</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">3</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">4</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">5</div>
	</div>
	<div class="col-2">
		<div class="box">6</div>
	</div>
</div>
